name: Truckman Simulator
description:
Description:

The game was created under the steering wheel!

You are an ordinary trucker! You need to carry loads and compete with other truckers. If you deliver the cargo first, you will be given a license to hire a worker who will bring you passive income.

Also, do not forget to eat and sleep, because in this game you can get out of the car and walk around the world.

This game I pay tribute to the game "Hard Truck: King of the road" or "Дальнобойщики 2".
